org.judal.storage.table

Class AbstractTableOperation<R extends Record>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.judal.storage.table.AbstractTableOperation<R>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Operation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractIndexableTableOperation

    public abstract class AbstractTableOperation<R extends Record>
extends Object
implements Operation

    Base class for table operation wrapper.

    Be sure to always call close() after an operation is done or else a connection leak may occur.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio Montoro Ten

      • fetch

        public abstract Object fetch(javax.jdo.FetchGroup fetchGroup,
                             String columnName,
                             Object valueSearched)
                      throws javax.jdo.JDOException

        Fetch records which contain a certain value at a given column.

        Parameters:
        fetchGroup - FetchGroup Columns to be fetched
        columnName - String Column name
        valueSearched - Object Value that must be present at column columnName
        Returns:
        Object an Iterable which type depends on whether the implementation is done by the Java or by the Scala adaptor.
        Throws:
        javax.jdo.JDOException

      • fetchFirst

        public abstract R fetchFirst(javax.jdo.FetchGroup fetchGroup,
                             String columnName,
                             Object valueSearched,
                             String... sortBy)
                      throws javax.jdo.JDOException

        Fetch records which contain a certain value at a given column.

        Parameters:
        fetchGroup - FetchGroup Columns to be fetched
        columnName - String Column name
        valueSearched - Object Value that must be present at column columnName
        sortBy - Optional. String column and direction (ASC or DESC) used to sort the values. Must be present in the FetchGroup
        Returns:
        R extends Record.
        Throws:
        javax.jdo.JDOException

      • fetchAsc

        public abstract Object fetchAsc(javax.jdo.FetchGroup fetchGroup,
                                String columnName,
                                Object valueSearched,
                                String sortByColum)
                         throws javax.jdo.JDOException

        Fetch records which contain a certain value at a given column and return results sorted in ascending order.

        Parameters:
        fetchGroup - FetchGroup Columns to be fetched
        columnName - String Column name
        valueSearched - Object Value that must be present at column columnName
        sortByColum - String Column used to sort the values. Must be present in the FetchGroup
        Returns:
        Object an Iterable which type depends on whether the implementation is done by the Java or by the Scala adaptor.
        Throws:
        javax.jdo.JDOException
